data.persona: I am a small child who grew up in a nearby village. My friends and I found a cave in the woods. I am afraid as we search the cave.
data.description:
You are in the Abandoned Mine.
A crumbling hole gapes in the side of the stone, surrounded by rotted wood timbers. A few rusted pieces of block and tackle lay half-buried in scraggly grass. A strange sort of humming noise emanates from within.
There's a block, a Timber, a block and tackle, a rotted wood timber, a grass, a pick, a stone, and a shovel here.
The rat is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a coat.

data.short_motivation: I need to hit the rat so that it won't bite me.
data.mid_motivation: I am going to find a treasure in the abandoned mine to show my friends.
data.long_motivation: I am going to keep exploring the places around the village with my friends and show them that I am not scared.
